propositions.original_proposition: The number of births from European countries increased by 8% from 2017 to 2018 across London boroughs.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Births from European countries have shown a noticeable upward trend across London boroughs from 2017 to 2018.
propositions.chart_title: Trends in Births from European Countries in London
propositions.chart_description: Visualizing the increase in births from European countries across London boroughs from 2017 to 2018.
propositions.reasoning: A 3D line chart effectively captures the temporal trend of increasing births, while allowing for geographic subdivision by boroughs to provide more detailed insights.
tapas_questions: How did the number of births from European countries change from 2017 to 2018?
Which London borough had the highest increase in births from European countries?
